website_summaries.verdict: Rage 2 is a fantastic action game, if judged purely on your ability to blow away post-apocalyptic punks. However, its mediocre story and gameplay padding dulls the experience a bit.
pros: Massive list of abilities to utilize and upgrade
cons: Weak story that's padded with busywork

customer_reviews.title: It's actually worth $60 IMO
customer_reviews.text: It took over an hour to download the game 37GB installed over a 1Gb cable connection. The game played really well on my PC for how "old" it is. The music, story, humor and the graphics seem nice enough for me to give it 5 stars. Much better than FO76 at launch. I can't seem to find any multiplayer options yet, that is the only downside. My PC specs: i7 4790 at 3.8Ghz, 16GB DDR3, dual gigabit ethernet directly to gigabit router, Samsung Nvme ssd Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Toasted

customer_reviews.title: Nonstop Action
customer_reviews.text: This game looks amazing, has intense action, has very realistic AI enemies, and has tons to do. The main campaign may not be too long, but there is so much more outside of that. Definitely my favorite single player game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does not activate on Steam
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a waste of money, the key does not activate on steam and it is not noted in the item description. I like to keep everything in a central location and I do not want to have multiple game launchers installed. I would rate the game itself 4 Stars, but I would have never purchased this game if I knew it did not activate on steam.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Soulja

customer_reviews.title: Wont run...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3k gaming setup from 2018 and the game just says "Running" and is taking 42% of my machines available processes... If the point of this game was to make me "rage out" then Bethesda, you've done it again! Hats off to you.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: It just sucks. Nothing like rage 1. When they make these games they try to add too much sometimes you need six hands. Some may like it but not me So after playing for a while it is the same thing over and over very monotonous. The steering of the car stinks because you need to use the keyboard it would be much easier if you could use the mouse to steer.
customer_reviews.author: fred Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe I got this game for 20$. There is off roading vehicle its actually really fun if you like that kind of thing, but the combat is good and the open world is so random (in a good way) Im running into convoys well fighting massive turrets. Lots of stuff to blow up, lots of stuff to find and lots of gore. Just change the controls to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Like a calm version of Borderlands 3. Not bad but not AAA.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: No game disc .its a download inside box
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good game.not happy about them leaving out in the description that this is a box with a number so you can download and must sign up for Bethesda account

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: I spent two hours plus trying to get this game up and running and all it would do is freeze before it ever started updated all my drivers and finally gave up it should be as simple as plug-and-play

customer_reviews.title: Total BS Digital download
customer_reviews.text: I can download games from any number of sources faster than getting a dvd. But when i do order a dvd i want a DVD not a DVD container with a download code. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeNoia

customer_reviews.title: Mdsnow66
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to play this on my laptop I have a Nvidia 1060 gaming laptop when I click play it just says running but won’t launch I updated my graphics card and did everything it told me to do still won’t run I give up I have it on Xbox one and i’ll Give that version 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Snow

customer_reviews.title: A few bugs but I like it alot
customer_reviews.text: This game doesn't support sli so the game running on a single gtx 970 at 2k didn't cut it. I bought a msi 2070 gaming z and all I can say is wow, I'm playing it at 2k ultra settings with AA off running between 67 and 85 fps. The campaign is short which I'm ok with but it needs more endgame content to make up for it. Add more things to do and fix some bugs I this game would be a diamond in the rough. I had no technical issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Rage 2 is Amazing !!!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a sweet 60 FPS shooter than look no further. PC gamers with high end graphic cards will be able to run this at 100 FPS. It runs as smooth as butter.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hakes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the game hoping to play it, however the Bethesda launcher doesn't work. I downloaded the game and it wouldn't start, I followed all the suggested fixes, but it didn't work. The controller skin was nice however.
customer_reviews.author: George Thomas

product_meta.title: Rage 2 for PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:Standard

RAGE 2 FOR PC
An asteroid has annihilated 80% of the earth's population, and humanity's numbers are dwindling. Ruthless and bloodthirsty gangs roam the open roads and the tyrannical Authority seek to rule with an iron fist. As Walker, the last Ranger of the wasteland and a threat to their power, you have been robbed of your home and left for dead. Now you'll have to rage for justice and freedom. With ludicrous vehicle combat, super-powered first-person mayhem, and an open world full of emergent madness, you will tear across an unforgiving wasteland battling sadistic gangs to find the tools and tech needed to crush the oppressive rule of The Authority once and for all.

FEATURES
 * WELCOME TO THE SHOOTERVERSE - id Softwares shooter pedigree and Avalanche Studios open world prowess is dream-team-made-real for RAGE 2.
 * THE WASTELAND AWAITS - Seamlessly traverse a vast and varied landscape, from lush jungles and treacherous swamps to sun-scorched deserts in your pursuit of The Authority.
 * PEDAL TO THE METAL - From monster trucks to gyrocopters, use an assortment of rugged and wasteland-ready vehicles to speed across the badlands. If you see it, you can drive it
 * THE LAST RANGER - Bring the pain using a collection of upgradable weapons, devastating Nanotrite powers, and Overdrive, the ability to push your guns beyond their mechanical limits.
 * FACTIONS & FOES - Fight against ferocious factions for control of the wasteland, each featuring a rogue's gallery of madmen, mutants, and monsters hungry for blood.
